amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to permit persons to file claims related to the free exercise of religion except for cases dealing with housing and employment discrimination. For these cases, small landlords, religious institutions and small business owners may file claims.

For these cases, small landlords, religious institutions and small business owners may file claims.
